title: Pictorial History of the American Carnival
description: CONTENTS: Acknowledgments; Bibliography; Introduction; European Roots; American Roots; World's Columbian Exposition, 1893; First Collective Amusement Organization; First Ten Years, 1900-1910; The Formative Teens; Uncertain Twenties; Depression Days; War And Its Aftermath; The Changing Fifties; Boom-Time and No Help; What's Ahead?; Index.
author: Joe McKennon
